synopsis: Having moved back to Japan from abroad, Rinku Aimoto transfers to Yoba Academy where DJing is popular. She is deeply moved by a DJ concert she sees there, and decides to form a unit of her own with Maho Akashi, Muni Ohnaruto, and Rei Togetsu.While interacting with the other DJ units like Peaky P-key and Photon Maiden, Rinku and her friends aim for the high stage!(Source: Funimation)
